inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed cancer or benign tumours of the head and neck area treated with hemi-neck radiotherapy to ≥ 50Gy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Received radiotherapy to the neck area more than 24 months previously
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have active head and neck cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a prior history of carotid endarterectomy or carotid angioplasty and stenting
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: carotid endarterectomy or carotid angioplasty and stenting

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery, which may be a contraindication for this trial.
